mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.create_id) FROM sys_request a WHERE TO_DAYS( CURDATE()) - TO_DAYS(a.create_time) = 1 AND a.create_id != - 1 ) AS yesterdayTotal, ( SELECT ROUND(AVG(a.total), 2) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.create_id) AS total FROM sys_request a WHERE a.create_id != - 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y%m%d')) a ) AS dailyTotal

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m') AS monthStr, COUNT(DISTINCT a.create_id) AS total FROM sys_request a WHERE a.create_id != - 1 AND PERIOD_DIFF( DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m'), DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y%m')) <= 7 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y%m')

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user a WHERE TO_DAYS(CURDATE()) - TO_DAYS(a.create_time) = 1) AS yesterdayAddTotal, ( SELECT TRUNCATE (SUM(a.total) / (TO_DAYS(CURDATE()) - TO_DAYS(MIN(a.createTime))), 2) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS total, MIN(a.create_time) AS createTime FROM sys_user a GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y%m%d')) a ) AS dailyAddTotal, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user a WHERE TO_DAYS( CURDATE()) - TO_DAYS(a.update_time) = 1 AND a.del_flag = TRUE ) AS yesterdayDeleteTotal, ( SELECT TRUNCATE (SUM(a.total) / (TO_DAYS(CURDATE()) - TO_DAYS(MIN(a.createTime))), 2) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS total, MIN(a.create_time) AS createTime FROM sys_user a WHERE a.del_flag = TRUE GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y%m%d')) a ) AS dailyDeleteTotal
SELECT COUNT(1) AS total, a.category FROM sys_request a GROUP BY a.category
